mapper.select: SELECT apl.* , ap.name AS extra__ap_name FROM application AS apl INNER JOIN ap AS ap ON apl.memberId = ap.id WHERE apl.delStatus != 1 AND apl.recruitId = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO application SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, recruitId = #{recruitId}
mapper.select: SELECT apl.* , ap.id as extra__ap_id , ap.name as extra__ap_name, aw.title as extra__aw_title, ar.name as extra__ar_name from application AS apl INNER JOIN ap AS ap ON apl.memberId = ap.id INNER JOIN artwork as aw ON aw.relTypeCode = 'recruitment' AND aw.relId = apl.recruitId INNER JOIN actingRole as ar ON ar.recruitmentId = apl.recruitId WHERE apl.id = #{applicationId}
